meanings.definition: A female domestic servant who is employed to do housework.
meanings.sent1: The housemaids cleaned the entire house yesterday.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired two housemaids to help with the cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The housemaids accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned everything pink!
meanings.sent4: The housemaids were like busy bees, buzzing around the house getting everything done.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the housemaids by their cheerful smiles and efficient work ethic.

meanings.definition: The female head of a household.
meanings.sent1: The housemaids of the family made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: As the housemaids, they were responsible for managing the household affairs.
meanings.sent3: The housemaids of the mansion were known for their impeccable organization skills.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the household with the grace and authority befitting a housemaids.
meanings.sent5: The housemaids oversaw every detail of the household with precision and care.
